message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.
I understand that $100 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $115 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $115 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I can do $110 for the product. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, though.
I appreciate your willingness to lower the price, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $108 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $110, but I'm willing to meet you at $109. It's the best I can do, Bob.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $109, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $107 for the product.
I'm not going to budge any further. I'm willing to meet you at $108, but that's as low as I'll go. It's the product's value to me, and I think it's a fair price.
I understand that you're not willing to budge further, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $106 for the product.
